text: The Fijian language has adopted many exonyms for places. This is a list of some major place name exonyms in Fijian. ==Australia== Ositerelia English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Adelaide Adelaidi Adelaide Brisbane Berisibani Brisbane Canberra Kabera Canberra Pronounced "kambera" Melbourne Malevani Melbourne Newcastle Niukaseli Newcastle Perth Pefa Perth Sydney Serene Sydney ==Egypt== Ijipite English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Cairo Kairo القاهرة (Al-Qāhirah) ==France== Varanise English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Paris Parisi Paris ==Greece== Karisi English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Athens Aceni Αθήνα (Athína) Ἀθῆναι (Athênai) Thessaloniki Cesalonika Θεσσαλονίκη ==Israel== Isireli English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Jerusalem Jerusalemi יְרוּשָׁלַיִם (Yerushaláyim) القُدس (Al-Quds) ==Italy== Itali English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Rome Roma Roma ==Japan== Japani English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Tokyo Tokio 東京都 (Tōkyō) ==Mexico== Mekisiko English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Mexico City Siti o Mekisiko Ciudad de México Altepetl Mexico ==New Zealand== Niusiladi English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Auckland Okaladi Auckland Tāmaki-makau-rau Pronounced "okalandi" Christchurch Karaisijeji Christchurch Ōtautahi Wellington Weligitoni Wellington Te Whanganui-a-Tara ==Syria== Siria English name Fijian name Endonym Notes Damascus Damasiko دمشق (Dimashq) ܕܰܪܡܣܘܩ (Darmsuq) ==United Kingdom== Matanitu Cokovata English name Fijian name Endonym Notes London Lodoni London Pronounced "londoni" Manchester Menijesita Manchester ==United States== Amerika English name Fijian name Endonym Notes New York City Siti o Niu Ioka New York City Exonyms Category:Lists of exonyms
title: Fijian exonyms
